name: pattern
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: pattern
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a particular way in which something is done, is organized, or happens

example.eg: The pattern of family life has been changing over recent years.
example.egtrans: 近年来家庭生活的模式一直在变化。

example.eg: A pattern is beginning to emerge from our analysis of the accident data.
example.egtrans: 我们对事故数据进行分析后发现一种模式开始显现出来。

example.eg: In this type of mental illness, the usual pattern is bouts of depression alternating with elation.
example.egtrans: 这种精神病通常的发病症状是时而萎靡不振，时而兴高采烈。

example.eg: Many behaviour(al) patterns have been identified in the chimp colony.
example.egtrans: 黑猩猩群体中的许多行为模式已被识别。

dsense.name: pattern
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: any regularly repeated arrangement, especially a design made from repeated lines, shapes, or colours on a surface

example.eg: Look, the frost has made a beautiful pattern on the window.
example.egtrans: 看啊，霜在窗户上形成了美丽的图案。

example.eg: The curtains had a floral pattern.

dsense.name: pattern
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: something that is used as an example, especially to copy

example.eg: The design is so good it's sure to set the pattern for many others.
example.egtrans: 这个设计太好了，一定会成为许多其他设计的样板。

dsense.name: pattern
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a drawing or shape used to show how to make something

example.eg: Cut out all of the pieces from the paper pattern and pin them on the cloth.
example.egtrans: 剪下服装纸样上的每一片，把它们别在布上。

dsense.name: pattern
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a small piece of cloth or paper taken from a usual-sized piece and used to show what it looks like
